name: Deadly Afterquest
description:
How To Play

QD or AD to move horizontally
 space to jump, 
F to spell a move point : /!\ Carefull it drains Heart energy /!\,
 E to Interact with levers.

How To Win 

Go with your heart to the doors. The Heart Life gauge decrease with time and "F spells". Parade the arrows with your shield. If an arrow touch you or the Heart, you lose.
